description:
Nami and Franky take a spin in the shark sub, Usopp and Sanji have a run in with a flock of deadly penguins, and Puzzle can no longer hide the fact that he`s alive!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les assassins attaquent ! Début d’une grande bataille sur la glace
Osoikuru Shikaku-tachi! Hyoujou Dai Battle Kaishi
The Assassins Attack! The Great Battle on Ice Begins
Tutti pronti per lo scontro sui ghiacci
Атака ассасинов! Начало великой ледяной битвы
هجوم القتلة! بداية المعركة الكبيرة على الجليد
襲い来る刺客たち! 氷上大バトル開始
